review:
Dr Naik is very good at her work. Dr Deval is very friendly , calm and always smiling. She explained me everything in detail and did a painless treatment. The clinic is well maintained and hygienic. 
Thank you doctor!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Harshit, my 2.5 yrs son then now he is 8, was going through unberable toth pains, he used to cry in middle of the his sleep, in such conditions Dr. Deval has precisely digonised the issue, and carried very careful and successful treatment for a boy of such a young age. Almost most of the teeth of my son was having issue, out of which 4 teeth needed root canaling and then capping. My was relifed from the pains is was under going, just b'cos proper diagonisis Dr. Deval had done and giving us confidence to take a decision for this treatment of our son at this young age.
Now my son is 8 and got new teeths, still 2 caps yet come out. 
Lot Thanks to Dr. Deval

tags: None
review: ***** ** *** *** *** ****** ****** ************** I went her to show my broken tooth for which she recommended the Root Canal. I opted for the same and she did it in single setting. I asked her as how could she do it in single setting to which she said, the tooth wasn't infected so she could do it in single setting. During the Root canal treatment she was in very much hurry , I asked her about that too to which she said she is like that every time. She completed the Root Canal and put the temporary Cement which came out in just an hour. I was very much worried by then as I had got the Root Canal done in single setting and my Jaws have started paining as the anaesthesia effect was going away. It pained for two days (mys mistake too as I did not take the Pain Killer). But then Overall it wasn't a great experience. I consulted another Doctor for further treatment.  *** ** **** *********** **** **** He explained me all the problems in detail. I also found her charges exorbitant. She said filling of a tooth would cost 2500, Root Canal 3500, consultation 300 and crowns 6000 to 8000.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Both the Doctor are cordial and very professional.  I visited the doctor for my tooth straightening and the cleanup.  Dr. Deval explained the problem and all the possible options available to fix the problem and finally concluded on going with the root canal and Zirconia crowns for my front teeth.  The treatment was carried very well, and I am very happy with the result and would recommend others to visit this clinic for all dental problems.  Overall satisfied with the clinic and the doctors, clinic is very well maintained and have good hygiene standards.  All the Covid protocols were adhered and patients were attended only on appointment basis

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Deval made me very comfortable during the wisdom teeth extraction process. She made sure that the process was not painful and took the required time to get the teeth out. In addition, she also explained all the care that needed to be taken to heal the process. As always, I am extremely happy with Dr. Deval's treatment.
reply_text:

Your feedback is greatly appreciated ,& it inspire us to maintain the highest standards of care at Dentista!!

Keeping my fingers crossed for the veneers and laser but am confident she will do a great job at it as well.

I would definitely recommend Dr. Deval to my friends and relatives and anyone out there who like me fear visiting the dentist.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Consulted her on Dental day using a free voucher from Practo.  As she got to know about it, she made us do X-Ray *** ****** ***** ********** ** *** ********** ***** ** **** *** ***** **** **** ******  ***** ** **** ********* **** ********* *** ***. She told that she'll e-mail the reports instead of soft-copy and we never received it. Her fees for most procedures were expensive than in the locality. I don't recommend her at all based on my experience.
reply_text:
Thank you for your valuable feedback!!
We believe in  delivering the treatment without compromising on the quality of treatment while maintaining the highest level of sanitisation and sterilisation protocols.
We always inform patients about the charges before starting any treatment including X-rays & consultation. 
We acknowledge the discomfort faced by you due to not receiving a copy of your X-ray via email & apologise for the same.  Kindly provide your email, so we can forward you the X-ray. 
Regards

tags: None
review: Dr. Deval explained to me what the next step was going to be in my treatment plan. She told me what I needed to know. She took the time to answer my questions. One thing I would like to say is that she needs to slow down while talking. She talks very fast and sometimes it is hard to catch each and every word. On the whole she was helpful. But she seemed a little anxious and hyped up while talking. I had to ask her to slow down to get a word in and to put forth my question. I like the fact that she is honest and does not beat around the bush.

tags: None
review:
She is very friendly and strikes a personal chord with the patients. Something you don't find with the people these days...Leave alone dentist!

Takes into account patients quams and replies back with shrewdness. In fact, my eyes lit up when I saw her again at the clinic .... 

On the treatment, I have noticed her as someone very artful and tries do handle everything with lot of professionalism...

what struck me most was, she remembered me as well as my wife when I came down for the second time.

I would recommend her to anyone and have a high regard for her.
